lead_paragraph: LEBOWITZ--Helen H.,wife of the late Jay Lebowitz, age 83, died peacefully on January 26 at home with her family by her side. Helen leaves behind three children, Bruce, David and Lisa. She also leaves behind two daughters-in-law, Lyn and Amy, seven grandchildren and three great- grandchildren. She is also survived by her brother, Dr. Robert Flesch. 1/3
snippet: LEBOWITZ--Helen H.,wife of the late Jay Lebowitz, age 83, died peacefully on January 26 at home with her family by her side. Helen leaves behind three children, Bruce, David and Lisa. headline.main: Paid Notice: Deaths  LEBOWITZ, HELEN H.
